select * from t_ban_log
and target_type = #{targetType,jdbcType=CHAR}
and target_value like concat('%', #{targetValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and ban_type = #{banType,jdbcType=CHAR}
and reason like concat('%', #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and remark like concat('%', #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
